name: PATCH_post
descriptionHtml:
Request:

PATCH : https://restful-booker.herokuapp.com/booking/1077

header:

  "Cookie":"token=839151454bff0e0"

  "Cache-Control":"no-cache"

  "Host":"restful-booker.herokuapp.com"
  "Accept-Encoding":"gzip, deflate, br"
  "Connection":"keep-alive"
  "Content-Length":"65"

body: 
  {
    "firstname" : "Dimon4ik",
    "lastname" : "Spirlhark"
}

Response:

Code: 200 Status: OK 

   
 
  header:   
  "Server":"Cowboy"
  "Connection":"keep-alive"

  "Content-Type":"application/json; charset=utf-8"
  "Content-Length":"177"
  "Etag":"W/\"b1-Oy7KxbKOeS1lv81QG+n8MaEHpPA\""
  "Date":"Thu, 10 Aug 2023 19:53:05 GMT"
  "Via":"1.1 vegur"  
 		 
  
    
 
  body:   
  {
  "firstname":"Dimon4ik",
  "lastname":"Spirlhark",
  "totalprice":111,
  "depositpaid":true,
  "bookingdates":{
    "checkin":"2022-01-01",
    "checkout":"2023-02-01"
  },
  "additionalneeds":"Breakfast"
}
